subject: Re: [junit] junit4.6 listener
msgSnippet: No.  Thanks to the test reordering and parallelization features, a more general idea of listener will have to be developed soon. It s still possible to do
messageBody:
No. Thanks to the test reordering and parallelization features, a
more general idea of "listener" will have to be developed soon.

It's still possible to do this using a custom implementation of Suite,
which I'm happy to help with.

David Saff

On Sun, Apr 12, 2009 at 2:52 PM, idan72 <ishai@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> Does Junit4.6 contain support for @BeforeClass and @AfterClass listener ?
>
> Thanks
